Package src

Class Scania

java.lang.Object
src.Entities.Car
src.Entities.Truck
src.Entities.Scania
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHasEngine, IHasTrailer, IMovable
public class Scania extends Truck
The class Scania is a subclass of Truck and initialises values for the angle of the trailer

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class src.Car

    EAST, isLoaded, NORTH, SOUTH, WEST

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Scania()
    Defines the specific truck type Scania and sets the number of doors to 2 sets the color to blue sets the power of the engine to 90 sets the name of the model tp Scania initializes the method stop engine which assures that the truck does not move when it is created

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    getTrailerAngle()
    returns the angle of the trailer
    void
    setTrailerAngle(double angle)
    sets the trailer angle to an input value, and only accepts values above min(0) and equal to or below max (70), and only does so if the trailer speed is zero
    void
    setTrailerDown()
    sets the trailer angle value to max (70)
    void
    setTrailerUp()
    sets the trailer angle value to min (0)
    double
    speedFactor()
    returns the speed factor if the trailer is up, otherwise returns illegal state exception
    boolean
    trailerIsDown()
    returns true if trailer is put down
    boolean
    trailerIsUp()
    returns true if trailer is put up
